name: dubtrack.fm - Better lobby
description: An improved lobby that is just as readable, with somewhat-shorter community listing and larger room titles Too plain-looking? Try this.
additional_info: This is created with the default colour scheme in mind. You will need to analyze whatever theme you are using to find what colours you need for integration with other themes. Modified padding, margins and line heights allow for each community listing to be little bit shorter and the use of the Bebas Neue font normally only seen in the music browser sidebar allows for easier-to-see room titles, while still taking less space. The border radius for everything has been zeroed out, which while looking less frilly also allows for a neater appearance in my opinion. 10/27/15 Removed font family declaration. Want it back? Install this style.
